title: Sacramento County will 'follow the state's lead' in lifting indoor mask mandate, Yolo County to 'evaluate situation' - KCRA Sacramento
content:
1. Sacramento County will 'follow the state's lead' in lifting indoor mask mandate, Yolo County to 'evaluate situation'  KCRA Sacramento
  2. California's indoor mask mandate will end next week for vaccinated individuals, Gov. Newsom says  Fox News
  3. California joins growing numbers of states saying mask mandates will end in coming weeks  The Washington Post
  4. California indoor mask mandate will end next week, but questions linger  SFGate
  5. California will end statewide mask mandate on Feb. 15  kuna noticias y kuna radio
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: On the heels of California announcing on Monday that it will lift its statewide mask requirement for vaccinated individuals later this month, Sacramento County confirmed that it is following suit.
